description:
Kamito is invited to Ellis room, as she wants him to help her study. Suddenly, she appears in a maid outfit. She asks Kamito if he wants to join the knights. Kamito agrees to help the knights out after seeing Ellis worried about her role as their leader. At same time, Ellis` sister comes back to school...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 風王騎士団[シルフィード]
